text: The Swan 39 was designed by Ron Holland and built by Nautor's Swan and first launched in 1978. This model is very much orientated to the IOR rule with a "R" version produced that looks more like a racing rather than a cruiser racing boat. ==References== ==External links== * Nautor Swan * Ron Holland Design Category:Sailing yachts Category:Keelboats Category:1970s sailboat type designs Category:Sailboat types built by Nautor Swan Category:Sailboat type designs by Ron Holland
title: Swan 39
